description: Time-based security reminders checked by /prime at session start

reminders.title: SSH Key Rotation
reminders.description: Rotate SSH keys for LUCIDLABS-HQ (nightwing + GitHub Actions). Generate new keys, update GitHub Secrets, revoke old keys.

reminders.title: Create dedicated deploy user
reminders.description: If team has grown: Create a dedicated 'deploy' user with minimal rights instead of using nightwing for everything.

reminders.title: CI/CD-only deployments
reminders.description: If >3 developers: Disable manual SSH deploys, enforce CI/CD-only deployments. Remove direct SSH deploy capability.
